changeSet.author: Yash

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN ( select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( 'Evelyn Mugwagwa', 'Joina Asefa', 'Jivas Zufuke', 'Admire Mupazviribwo', 'Wilfred Chinengundu', 'Samuel Mafa', 'Jane Mangwiro', 'Loice Ncube', 'Mary Mujayi', 'Kundai Nyanyiwa', 'Ennie Chipungu', 'Kudzai Kwembeya', 'Mercy Chikurira', 'Chrispen Tichaurawa', 'Tatenda Bakure', 'Dr Marangwanda', 'Learnmore Marinyame', 'Allen Hakuna', 'Israel Mukorera' ) and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" ) AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Provider name for Enhanced adherence counseling");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to Provider name for "Provider name for Enhanced adherence counseling"
